main.jsx: Bootstraps the React app and mounts <App/> into the DOM; enables routing via BrowserRouter.
App.jsx: Application shell, routing, and PlayerContext: holds global player state (queue, index, playing), exposes playback controls, and renders pages and the bottom ribbon player.
styles.css: Global stylesheet: theme, layout, navbar, player ribbon, shared utilities used across pages/components.
components/FacialExpression.jsx: Camera + face-expression detector: loads face-api models, accesses webcam, runs detection and requests mood-based recommendations from backend.
components/FacialExpression.css: Styles for the facial expression camera UI and video feed.
components/MoodSongs.jsx: Renders mood-based song recommendations and per-track controls (play/pause, seek). Integrates with PlayerContext for volume and queue operations.
components/MoodSongs.css: Styles for song cards, per-track progress/range, mood badge, and list layout.
components/SearchPanel.jsx: Search input and small UI block used by the Search page to query songs and update parent state.
pages/Search.jsx: Search/home page: lets users search for songs (iTunes) and add previews to the queue.
pages/TopSongs.jsx: Top Songs page: displays ranked/horizontal list of popular tracks with quick-play controls.
pages/About.jsx: About page: explains the app, privacy notes, and contribution guidance.
pages/Contact.jsx: Contact page: contact information or feedback form for the project.
public/models: Pretrained face-api models (weights/manifests) used by the camera component for expression and face detection; loaded by the client at runtime.
